p: From the sequential extraction scheme illustrated and discussed in the methodology section, the product yields are as follows: essential oil (12 mL); oily/gelatinous material (18 g); yellowish solid (2.4 g); recrystallized flavonoid (0.64 g); marc 2 residue (12 g). The recovered yield of the isolated flavonoid was about 0.24% of the raw leaves.
